places_to_visit.name: Edinburgh Castle
places_to_visit.description: Edinburgh Castle is a historic fortress perched on Castle Rock. It offers stunning views of the city and houses the Crown Jewels of Scotland and the Stone of Destiny.

places_to_visit.name: Royal Mile
places_to_visit.description: The Royal Mile is a historic street in Edinburgh that runs through the Old Town. It is lined with shops, restaurants, and historic landmarks, including St Giles’ Cathedral.

places_to_visit.name: Holyrood Palace
places_to_visit.description: Holyrood Palace is the official residence of the British monarch in Scotland. Visitors can explore the State Apartments and the ruins of the 12th-century Holyrood Abbey.

places_to_visit.name: Arthur’s Seat
places_to_visit.description: Arthur’s Seat is an extinct volcano and a popular hiking spot offering panoramic views of Edinburgh. It’s a great place for a nature walk and to see the city from above.

places_to_visit.name: National Museum of Scotland
places_to_visit.description: The National Museum of Scotland features diverse collections ranging from Scottish history and culture to natural history and world cultures.
